title: 7 Bad Economic Ideas
teaser: Will a free market regulate itself? Should we do everything we can to curb inflation? Are budget deficits and government economic interventions universally bad? Joy Cardin's guest journalist says no to all of these -- and that they are just some of the bad ideas perpetuated by mainstream economics. He discusses why he thinks they're wrong, and how we should regulate our economies instead.
